title: What are the greatest Punjabi folk songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Being a punjabi , I love punjabi folk songs. Here are my top 5 : 1) Challa - Gurdas Mann2) Kinna Sohna Tainu - Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan3) Tu Mane Ya Na Mane Dildara - Wadali Brothers4) Haal Ve Rabba - Hans Raj Hans5) Sajna Ve Sajna - Gurdas Mann Above songs are relatively new. Old folk singers include : Yamla Jatt , Surinder Kaur, Gurmeet Bawa , Mohammed Sadiq , Kuldeep Manak ,Chamkila , etc.
